title: Beginning iOS 7 Development
subtitle: Exploring the iOS SDK
authors: Jack Nutting, Fredrik Olsson, David Mark, Jeff LaMarche
desc: The team that brought you the bestselling Beginning iPhone Development is back again for Beginning iOS 7 Development, bringing this definitive guide up-to-date with Apple's latest and greatest iOS 7 SDK, as well as with the latest version of Xcode.There's coverage of brand-new technologies, includin...
